summary: The diff shows backend/main.mo still contains multiple AccessControl trap statements that should have been removed per REQ-1. The toggleAgentStatus function still has the trap block instead of the required implementation (REQ-2). No evidence of the clearBoardroom function being added (REQ-3).

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all AccessControl trap blocks from backend/main.mo
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows AccessControl trap statements still present in multiple functions including getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile, toggleAgentStatus, and abortDebate. These were supposed to be completely removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix toggleAgentStatus function to match exact implementation without trap statements
missing_requirements.reason: The toggleAgentStatus function in the diff still contains the AccessControl trap block 'if (not (AccessControl.hasPermission(accessControlState, caller, #admin))) { Runtime.trap(...) };' which should have been removed. The function should have no access control checks.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add clearBoardroom function to the bottom of the actor in backend/main.mo
missing_requirements.reason: The diff is truncated and does not show any clearBoardroom function being added. No evidence of this function exists in the visible portion of backend/main.mo.
